ComicInfo.Summary: The second chapter of the 27 saga comes to a close with a stunning confrontation between Garland and one-hit-wonder-witch, Valerie Hayes. It's a talent competition with the entire world as the audience, judged by none other than the God of Fame. The loser loses it all, and the winner takes... everything!
